A B C D E F G H I L M N O P R S T V W X

A

AncestorPinnedException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown by the various I/O methods in XADiskBasicIOOperations when an attempt to acquire required locks (over file/directory objects) could not succeed because one of the ancestors (parent directory, parent's parent directory, and further) of the corresponding files/directories has been "pinned" by some other transaction.
AncestorPinnedException(String, String) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.AncestorPinnedException
 
available() - Method in class org.xadisk.additional.XAFileInputStreamWrapper
 
available() - Method in interface org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces.XAFileInputStream
Returns the number of bytes (readily) available in the internal buffer of this stream.

If an application wants to boot an XADisk instance in the same JVM (native XADisk instance), it can call this method.

ClosedStreamException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown by the i/o Streams XAFileInputStream and XAFileOutputStream, when an operation is invoked on the stream, but it could not be performed because the stream is already closed.

ConnectionException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown by any of the XADisk API methods when the target XADisk instance is a remote one (running on a remote JVM) and a communication error (most likely, network related) is encountered during the method call.

D

DeadLockVictimizedException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception can appear as a "cause" of a TransactionRolledbackException and indicates that an attempt to acquire required locks (over file/directory objects) resulted in a deadlock (a situation when a set of transactions asking for resources, here locks, and also holding some resources, form a cycle of dependencies.
DeadLockVictimizedException(String) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.DeadLockVictimizedException
 
deleteFile(File) - Method in interface org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces.XADiskBasicIOOperations
Deletes a file or directory.
DirectoryNotEmptyException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown when a directory delete operation was invoked but the directory is not empty.
DirectoryNotEmptyException(String) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.DirectoryNotEmptyException
 
DirectoryPinningFailedException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown by the move operation on a directory when an attempt to acquire a "pin" ( a pin is a special kind of lock over a directory which is acquired by a transaction willing to move the directory) over the target directory could not succeed because one of the descendants (children files/directories, children's children file/directories, and further) of the directory has been locked by some other transaction.
DirectoryPinningFailedException(String, String) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.DirectoryPinningFailedException

equals(Object) - Method in class org.xadisk.filesystem.FileSystemStateChangeEvent
 

F

FileAlreadyExistsException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown by createFile, copyFile and moveFile methods when the file or directory (whichever relevant) that has to be created by the method already exists.

isDueToNonHeavyWriteModeOutputStream() - Method in exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.FileUnderUseException
This method returns true only and only when this exception is thrown by createXAFileOutputStream with the heavyWrite parameter as true, but another output stream (XAFileOutputStream) is open for the same file in current transaction in non-heavyWrite mode.

This exception is a super class of all other exceptions which are thrown by various i/o methods in XADiskBasicIOOperations when a resource (file or directory) locking fails.

N

NoTransactionAssociatedException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is thrown by various methods in Session, XASession, XADiskBasicIOOperations, XAFileInputStream, XAFileOutputStream and XADiskUserLocalTransaction when an associated (current) transaction was expected, but there is no such transaction.

T

toString() - Method in class org.xadisk.filesystem.FileSystemStateChangeEvent
Returns a human readable string describing this event.
TransactionRolledbackException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception is a subclass of NoTransactionAssociatedException and can be thrown when a method call (in Session, XASession, XADiskBasicIOOperations, XAFileInputStream, XAFileOutputStream or XADiskUserLocalTransaction) was expecting an associated transaction, but such a transaction has already been rolled-back by XADisk System.
TransactionRolledbackException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.TransactionRolledbackException
 
TransactionTimeoutException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This exception can appear as a cause of a TransactionRolledbackException and indicates that the reason for the rollback by XADisk System was transaction time out.
TransactionTimeoutException() - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.TransactionTimeoutException

XAApplicationException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This is an abstract super class of all exceptions which are thrown when a client-scoped (not system scoped) problem is encountered during an API call to XADisk.

XADiskBasicIOOperations.PermissionType - Enum in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces

XAFileInputStream - Interface in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces
Represents an input stream to a file.
XAFileInputStreamWrapper - Class in org.xadisk.additional
This class acts as a wrapper around the XAFileInputStream for the purpose of providing the standard InputStream implementation (because XAFileInputStream itself does not extend the InputStream).
XAFileInputStreamWrapper(XAFileInputStream) - Constructor for class org.xadisk.additional.XAFileInputStreamWrapper
The sole constructor which takes the XAFileInputStream to be wrapped.
XAFileOutputStream - Interface in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces
Represents an output stream to a file.
XAFileOutputStreamWrapper - Class in org.xadisk.additional
This class acts as a wrapper around the XAFileOutputStream for the purpose of providing the standard OutputStream implementation (because XAFileOutputStream itself does not extend the OutputStream).
XAFileOutputStreamWrapper(XAFileOutputStream) - Constructor for class org.xadisk.additional.XAFileOutputStreamWrapper
The sole constructor which takes the XAFileOutputStream to be wrapped.

This interface represents a reference to an XADisk instance.
XAFileSystemProxy - Class in org.xadisk.bridge.proxies.interfaces
This is a utility class for booting new XADisk instances and obtaining references to existing XADisk instances on the same JVM or remote JVMs.

This interface, like Session, is used by applications running in non-JCA environments.
XASystemBootFailureException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This is an unchecked exception thrown by bootNativeXAFileSystem and boot-up process of a XADisk JCA Resource Adapter to indicate that the XADisk instance has encountered a critical issue and could not complete its booting process.
XASystemBootFailureException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.XASystemBootFailureException
 
XASystemBootFailureException(String) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.XASystemBootFailureException
 
XASystemException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This is an abstract super class of all exceptions which are thrown because of a problem associated with the whole XADisk system, and may not be linked to (though, it could be directly/indirectly caused by) the method call (which threw this exception) from the application client.
XASystemException(String) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.XASystemException
 
XASystemException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.XASystemException

XASystemException() - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.XASystemException
 
XASystemNoMoreAvailableException - Exception in org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions
This is an unchecked exception thrown by any of the XADisk APIs to indicate that the XADisk instance has encountered a critical issue and is no more available.
XASystemNoMoreAvailableException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception org.xadisk.filesystem.exceptions.XASystemNoMoreAvailableException
